Plot: At college Paige meets Eddie, a fellow student from Denmark, whom she first dislikes but later accepts, likes, and loves; he proves to be Crown Prince Edvard. Paige follows him to Copenhagen, and he follows her back to school with a plan.
Title: The Prince and Me
Actors: Julia Stiles, Luke Mably, Ben Miller, Miranda Richardson
Writer: Mark Amin (story), Katherine Fugate (story), Jack Amiel (screenplay), Michael Begler (screenplay), Katherine Fugate (screenplay)
